strapiPost.title: New Tex-Mex Restaurant Coming to Downtown Springdale
strapiPost.content:
A new Tex-Mex fusion style restaurant called Casa Alejo is coming soon to downtown Springdale.

  • Options aplenty: Between Local Lime in Rogers, the more recent addition of Taco & Tamale in Bentonville, another Taco & Tamale coming to South Fayetteville, and now Casa Alejo in Springdale, NWA's Tex-Mex scene is pretty stacked.
  • Bases covered: The sneak peaks Casa Alejo has given everyone on their Instagram look like they will have the margs you would expect at a Tex-Mex restaurant, good vibes, and their own eclectic spin on Tex-Mex food.

Follow along here for updates on Casa Alejo.
